languageKey.label: The Quick Note is your personal notepad in TYPO3. Nobody else sees it and it's intended to be a place for you to drop short reminder notes which relates to your work in TYPO3.
Quick Note
Update
Reset
The note has been saved
Do you remember the used password? There is no chance to retrieve your notes without it!
The Quick Note is your personal notepad in TYPO3. Nobody else sees it and it's intended to be a place for you to drop short reminder notes which relates to your work in TYPO3.
Quick Note
